smile.plot.swing

Class PlotGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • smile.plot.swing.PlotGrid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.awt.print.Printable, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class PlotGrid
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.print.Printable
    PlotGrid organizes multiple plots in a grid layout.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
